title: Bug 13189 - Refactoring: Deleting Fields Context Menu Overridden by Message Dialog
description:
Version: 20020409, Environment: LinuxMotif and Windows 2000.
Steps:
1. Set up JUnit.
2. [Additional steps not provided]
OB: No context menu is displayed; instead, a message dialog prompts immediately, asking whether I want to delete the getter/setter as well.
EB: Expect a context menu to appear when attempting to delete fields during refactoring. The system should not override the context menu with a premature message dialog.
SR:
